The statistics enable command enables the performance statistics function.
The undo statistics enable command disables the performance statistics function. The statistics enable command enables the performance statistics function. The undo statistics enable command disables the performance statistics function. By default, the performance statistics function is disabled.
Examples: Warning: This operation will stop all statistics tasks. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: To collect performance statistics, run the statistics enable command to enable the performance statistics function.
